description: Scandium is a lightweight metal often classified as a rare-earth element due to its similar chemical properties. It improves the strength and heat resistance of aluminum alloys, making them valuable in aerospace and high-performance sports equipment. Scandium is also used in lighting, particularly in metal-halide lamps that produce bright, natural-looking light. Although not widely abundant, its unique properties make it important for specialized technologies. Careful extraction and processing ensure efficient use of this rare and valuable element.
name: Scandium
